title: Report: Bitcoin Miners’ Revenue Down by More Than 30% in the Last 6 Months
description: In the past six months, Bitcoin miners’ revenue has dropped by more than 30%, with November revenues approximately $270 million lower than October revenues. The drop in Bitcoin miners’ revenue is attributed to Bitcoin price volatility, increased competition, and higher electricity prices. Gradual Decline in Miner Revenue Bitcoin miners’ revenues have fallen by over 30% […]

title: ‘Open Banking & Customer Experience Transformation Leadership Forum’ Taking place in Berlin | Germany
description: In a strategic move reflecting a commitment to innovation and the evolving landscape of Open Banking, the highly regarded ‘Open Banking & SCA Leadership Forum’ has been rebranded as the ‘Open Banking & CX Transformation Leadership Forum.’ This transformative journey underscores the forum’s dedication to exploring the advancements in Open Banking and recognizing the pivotal ...
